aspect.name: Genomics
aspect.subtitle: Genome annotation
aspect.intro-text: The gene identifiers in FishMine are obtained from ZFIN.

aspect.name: Proteins
aspect.subtitle:
Protein and proteomics
data
aspect.intro-text: Protein annotation (including family and domain annotation) from UniProt.

aspect.name: Gene Ontology
aspect.intro-text: Gene Ontology (GO) annotations for Danio rerio. The GO annotations are 'attached' to Genes and so each Gene has a reference (link) to a list of its GO annotations (if available).
